name: Milkshake Maker Ice Cream Cooking for Kids / Girls
name_original: Milkshake Maker Ice Cream Cooking for Kids / Girls
description:
Ready to make some Awesome Ice Cream Milkshakes?!

Top Crazy Games knows you love milkshakes so we're bringing all of your favorite ice cream milkshakes. Play and make your own today!

Features:
- Dispense your ice cream
- Pick from many flavors
- Throw it in, mix, and blend
- Pick your favorite cup and straw
- DRINK! REFILL IT! DRINK IT AGAIN!

Lots to choose from:
- Flavors
- Cups
- Stickers
- Decorations
- More!!!!!

Play it. What are you waiting for? :) A Milkshake for an awesome day!

Download Ice Cream Milkshake Maker Cooking for Kids / Girls right now and have fun making and mixing!

PLEASE NOTE:
- Ice Cream Milkshake Maker Cooking for Kids / Girls is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.
